languages.text: Конец неудачливых членов команды быстр и страшен — пули обрывают их жизни, огонь огнеметов уничтожает тела. Зловещее зеркало тоже не доставляет хлопот в этот раз — сервиторам удается вышвырнуть его за борт. Авгуры показывают, что в полете зеркало продолжает выделять биомассу — однако на корабле более ничего странного не происходит. Можно продолжать полет.

Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.
languages.original_text: Конец неудачливых членов команды быстр и страшен — пули обрывают их жизни, огонь огнеметов уничтожает тела. Зловещее зеркало тоже не доставляет хлопот в этот раз — сервиторам удается вышвырнуть его за борт. Авгуры показывают, что в полете зеркало продолжает выделять биомассу — однако на корабле более ничего странного не происходит. Можно продолжать полет.

traits.locale_text: The unlucky crew members' death is quick, yet horrifying. The bullets kill them, the fire takes care of their bodies. The loathsome mirror poses no further threat and the servitors are able to throw it down the disposal chute. The augur detects the mirror is still leaking biomass as it flies through the void. The macabre incidents stop and the crew can now continue their journey.

The unlucky crew members' death is quick, yet horrifying. The bullets kill them, the fire takes care of their bodies. The loathsome mirror poses no further threat and the servitors are able to throw it down the disposal chute. The augur detects the mirror is still leaking biomass as it flies through the void. The macabre incidents stop and the crew can now continue their journey.

The unlucky crew members' death is quick, yet horrifying. Bullets kill them, the blaze from the flamethrowers takes care of their bodies. The accursed mirror poses no further threat and the servitors are able to throw it down the disposal chute. The augur detects the mirror is still leaking biomass as it flies through the void. The macabre incidents cease and the crew can now continue their journey.

Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

languages.text: 那些不幸的船员很快就一命呜呼，而且死得很惨。他们的身体被枪林弹雨打成了筛子，随后，船员用火焰喷射器销毁了他们的尸体。那面邪恶的镜子被处理掉了，也没有发生进一步的事故。机仆们把它拖到了排污槽，将镜子扔出了飞船。俄歇矩阵依然时时刻刻对飞船之外的镜子进行扫描。扫描结果显示，镜子依然在泄漏生物物质。不过，飞船上所有的怪事都已经结束了，船员们可以继续前进了。
languages.original_text: Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: 那些不幸的船员很快就一命呜呼，而且死得很惨。他们的身体被枪林弹雨打成了筛子，随后，船员用火焰喷射器销毁了他们的尸体。那面邪恶的镜子被处理掉了，也没有发生进一步的事故。奴工们把它拖到了排污槽，将镜子扔出了飞船。俄歇矩阵依然时时刻刻对飞船之外的镜子进行扫描。扫描结果显示，镜子依然在泄漏生物物质。不过，飞船上所有的怪事都已经结束了，船员们可以继续前进了。

languages.text: La muerte alcanza a los desafortunados tripulantes de forma rápida y terrible: en una lluvia de balas. El fuego de los lanzallamas destruye los cuerpos. El siniestro espejo se elimina sin incidentes, transportado por servidores hasta el conducto de desechos. Los augures siguen al espejo durante su vuelo por el vacío, indicando que sigue despidiendo materia orgánica. En cualquier caso, los incidentes extraños de la nave llegan a su fin y la tripulación puede continuar su viaje.
languages.original_text: Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: La muerte alcanza a los desafortunados tripulantes de forma rápida y terrible: en una lluvia de balas. El fuego de los lanzallamas destruye los cuerpos. El siniestro espejo se elimina sin incidentes, transportado por servidores hasta el conducto de desechos. Los augures siguen al espejo durante su vuelo por el vacío, indicando que sigue despidiendo materia orgánica. En cualquier caso, los incidentes extraños de la nave llegan a su fin y la tripulación puede continuar su viaje.

languages.text: 不運なクルーには、素早く、恐ろしい方法…弾丸の雨の中で死が訪れる。フレイマーの炎は遺体を焼き尽くす。不吉な鏡はサーヴィターが廃棄用シュートから投棄し処分された。落下する鏡をスキャナーが追跡し、まだバイオマターが漏れ出ていることを示す。しかし、船内での奇妙な事件はすべて解決し、クルーは旅を続けることができた。
languages.original_text: Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: 不運なクルーには、素早く、恐ろしい方法…弾丸の雨の中で死が訪れる。フレイマーの炎は遺体を焼き尽くす。不吉な鏡はサーヴィターが廃棄用シュートから投棄し処分された。落下する鏡をスキャナーが追跡し、まだバイオマターが漏れ出ていることを示す。しかし、船内での奇妙な事件はすべて解決し、クルーは旅を続けることができた。

languages.text: Der Tod ereilt die unglückseligen Crewmitglieder auf ebenso schnelle wie grauenhafte Weise — durch einen Kugelhagel. Das Feuer aus einem Flammenwerfer zerstört die Leichen. Der grauenhafte Spiegel wird ohne weitere Zwischenfälle entsorgt — Servitoren werfen ihn über die Müllrutsche über Bord. Auguren verfolgen die Flugbahn des Spiegels und bemerken, dass er noch immer Biomasse absondert. Alle merkwürdigen Vorfälle auf dem Schiff sind jedoch Geschichte, und die Crew kann ihre Reise fortsetzen.
languages.original_text: Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: Der Tod ereilt die unglückseligen Crewmitglieder auf ebenso schnelle wie grauenhafte Weise — durch einen Kugelhagel. Das Feuer aus einem Flammenwerfer zerstört die Leichen. Der grauenhafte Spiegel wird ohne weitere Zwischenfälle entsorgt — Servitoren werfen ihn über die Müllrutsche über Bord. Auguren verfolgen die Flugbahn des Spiegels und bemerken, dass er noch immer Biomasse absondert. Alle merkwürdigen Vorfälle auf dem Schiff sind jedoch Geschichte, und die Crew kann ihre Reise fortsetzen.

languages.text: La mort s'abat rapidement sur les infortunés membres d'équipage sous la forme d'une rafale de balles. Les corps sont détruits au lance-flammes. Vous vous débarrassez du sinistre miroir sans problème : des servitors le jettent par la trappe d'évacuation. Les augures traquent le miroir pendant sa chute et indiquent qu'il émet encore de la biomatière. Cependant, les incidents étranges qui avaient lieu sur le vaisseau ont pris fin, et l'équipage peut maintenant poursuivre son voyage.
languages.original_text: Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.

traits.locale_text: La mort s'abat rapidement sur les infortunés membres d'équipage sous la forme d'une rafale de balles. Les corps sont détruits au lance-flammes. Vous vous débarrassez du sinistre miroir sans problème : des serviteurs le jettent par la trappe d'évacuation. Les augures traquent le miroir pendant sa chute et indiquent qu'il émet encore de la biomatière. Cependant, les incidents étranges qui avaient lieu sur le vaisseau ont pris fin, et l'équipage peut maintenant poursuivre son voyage.

languages.text: Ölüm, şanssız mürettebatı hızlı ve korkunç bir şekilde buluyor: Mermilerin hedefi oluyorlar. Alevsaçanlar ise cesetlerini ortadan kaldırıyor. Uğursuz ayna, başka bir soruna neden olmadan hizmetörler tarafından imha oluğundan atılıyor. Alametler, uçuşu sırasında aynayı izliyor ve hâlâ biyomadde sızdırdığını tespit ediyor. Gelgelelim gemideki garip hadiseler sona eriyor ve mürettebat, sorunsuz şekilde yolculuğa devam edebiliyor.
languages.original_text: Death comes to the unlucky crew members in quick and horrifying fashion — under a hail of bullets. Flamer fire destroys the bodies. The sinister mirror is dispatched without any further trouble — servitors jettison it via the disposal chute. Augurs track the mirror on its flight, indicating that it is still leaking biomatter. However, all strange incidents on the ship have ended, and the crew can now continue their journey.
